name: texan
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone from the US state of Texas: He is a native Texan who makes a living off the land. About 56 percent of Texans said they would support a tax increase if the money were dedicated to making schools safer.
More examplesFewer examplesHe married the daughter of a wealthy Texan.Being a Texan is a big part of being George W. Bush.About 440,718 Texans were employed in high-tech companies in 2000.

belonging or relating to the US state of Texas or its people: They settled in the Texan capital, Austin. Tom Hanks plays the part of the womanising Texan congressman.
More examplesFewer examplesHe got a job with the Texan branch of IBM.She speaks with a strong Texan drawl.A hoot is Texan for a good hard laugh.
